,className:"hover:text-yellow-300",children:item.name},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:toggleLanguage,className:"bg-yellow-400 text-black px-3 py-1 rounded",children:["\uD83C\uDF10 ",lang==="en"?"TA":"EN"]})]})]});};export default Navbar;
